thread.title: lovery hotel
thread.title_full: lovery hotel - Review of Hotel Claude Bernard Saint-Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: cadavis2017
title: lovery hotel
text:
Me and the wife stayed here and it was perfect. the staff was lovery and the rooms was always clean. very good price also and location.
also close to the latin qtr with is amazing. busy but so many hidden gems restaurants and amazing prices. 3 courses for 10 15 and 20 euro and really good also.
Room Tip: good price and location See more room tips
